title: Worlds of IF (August 1974)
description: The writings of Lester Del Rey have been removed due to a request by John Betancourt of Wildside Press. (Contents information excerpted from The Internet Speculative Fiction Database ) Art: Midnight by the Morphy Watch by uncredited A Little Night Flying by uncredited Ars Gratia (If, July-August 1974) by Freff Half-Baked Publisher's Delight by Freff Plaything by Jack Gaughan No Time Like the Past by uncredited Berserker's Planet (Part 2 of 2) by uncredited Angel Fix by Freff Tube by Jack Gaughan Essays: On the Urbanization of the Solar System by Jim Baen Torchships Now! (If, July-August 1974) by Robert D. Enzmann The Alien Viewpoint (If, July-August 1974) by Richard E. Geis Reading Room (If, July-August 1974) by Lester del Rey Sf Calendar (If, July-August 1974) by uncredited Novelette: Angel Fix by James Tiptree, Jr. Serial: Berserker's Planet (Part 2 of 2) by Fred Saberhagen Short Stories: Midnight by the Morphy Watch by Fritz Leiber A Little Night Flying by Bob Shaw Half-Baked Publisher's Delight by Isaac Asimov Plaything by Larry Niven No Time Like the Past by Jerry Goodz Tube by G. C. Edmondson
